name: DaystillDragonCon
0:
”Alexa, open dragon con”
”Alexa, start dragon con”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dragon con
des:
How many days are left before Dragon Con?? Let Alexa tell you along with providing her own commentary on the greatest convention in the world. Held annually on Labor Day Weekend in Atlanta Georgia, this 24/7 event is ran by volunteer fans FOR fans.

For more information about Dragon Con, visit http://dragoncon.org

This skill was developed by a fan and is in no way affiliated in any official capacity nor represents either DRAGON CON or DCI, INC

Developed with Alexa Skill Blurprints, any feedback will not be shared directly with developer/author.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
